Articles.Content:
I'm walking around with ideas to make a tool that can be used to merge save files, probably by dragging pieces from one to another.

If there's interest, I will probably start development soonish (no guarantees it will reach stable orbit, have to do it in my spare time in between a full time job, flying rockets, running a household, and keeping in contact with a lot of friends).
I remember RFOLCoptor 64 bit was making one... Or some else entirely.
Yeah, it was ROFLcopter64bit who was making one. I discussed it with him, not sure what's happening now in regards to development.

ok, no need to do double effort then

Might still do it if the effort seems to be small, but that'd depend on the featureset of course
